data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during Santa Lucia cruise from Cádiz to Mogador started at 1785-04-27
Ship: Santa Lucia (Fragata), Voyage: Cádiz - Mogador, 1st Observer: Vicente Tofiño (Capitan)
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
